Posts.Title: Best friend has stage 4 cancer - getting worse. I'm lost.

Posts.Content: Ashley.... If ct didn't show anything than why didn't they do another test,when my husband had all these tests nothing showed up,on these tests,and he has a tumor in his pancreas 4 stage ,so don't always trust those tests. I know how hard it is to entertain kids when your tired,but simple things make kids happy quality time with them best to you kathy
